title: Evidence-based XAI of clinical decision support systems for differential diagnosis: Design, implementation, and evaluation
details: Y Miyachi, O Ishii, K Torigoe - medRxiv, 2024
abstract: Introduction: We propose the Explainable AI (XAI) model for Clinical Decision Support Systems (CDSSs). It supports physician's Differential Diagnosis (DDx) with Evidence-based Medicine (EBM). It identifies instances of the case data contributing …
